before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"4jf2g","text":"Ensure you have enough tissue before preparation. We recommend using at least 30 mg of tissue to start with.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6trf","text":"This protocol describes the procedure for protein extraction, enzymatic digestion, sample cleanup an dTMT labeling for LC-MS analysis. Proper sample preparation and clean-up are extremely important to ensuring quality LC-MS data and reproducibility. Tissues tend to vary more than cells and extra care should be taken as MS is sensitive to any sample variations. In addition, proper clean-up is a preventative measure to less damage to the instruments and superior data. Here, we described each step in detail on how to process tissue samples prior to analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Human BioMolecular Atlas Program (HuBMAP) Method Development Community

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1hfmi","text":"Place the tissue chunk onto a cell culture plate on ice and mince with disposable scalpels to the best of your abilities.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3699e","text":"Add    lysis buffer (  GdmCl,   TCEP,   CAA,   Tris  ) to the minced tissue sample and transfer it to a Matrix D tube with ceramic beads. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":30,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":38,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":45,"length":1},{"key":5,"offset":52,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"7ttiv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"500","guid":"2D59CE1090D711EA8E5533D5A09522F0","id":"38546","label":"","unit":1}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"6","guid":"BA3B43C090E811EA8E5533D5A09522F0","id":"2891","label":"","unit":21}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"10","guid":"BCF4223090E811EA8E5533D5A09522F0","id":"2892","label":"","unit":28}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"40","guid":"BEF3E9D090E811EA8E5533D5A09522F0","id":"2893","label":"","unit":28}},"4":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"100","guid":"D32C270090E811EA8E5533D5A09522F0","id":"2894","label":"","unit":28}},"5":{"type":"ph","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"C4B96C0090E811EA8E5533D5A09522F0","id":0,"number":"8.5"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"11ohq","text":"Elute peptides off the column with 150uL of   acetonitrile with   acetic acid, followed by 150uL of   acetonitrile with   acetic acid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":64,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":100,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":120,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"40","guid":"9CAF729090F111EABAE40A58A9FEAC2A","id":"2904","label":"","unit":206}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"0.1","guid":"B47CA07690F111EABAE40A58A9FEAC2A","id":"2905","label":"","unit":206}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"80","guid":"C961901D90F111EABAE40A58A9FEAC2A","id":"2906","label":"","unit":206}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"0.1","guid":"C96190AA90F111EABAE40A58A9FEAC2A","id":"2907","label":"","unit":206}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bi0pg","text":"Quench the reaction with   hydroxylamine.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"6ugn1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"5","guid":"A0E7298090F611EA92096B48260ADBC9","id":"2910","label":"","unit":206}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5otbu","text":"Put the sample in the SpeedVac to dry.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
